Grand Master Tobias:
Congratulations! You have now become a proud Dark Elf Assassin. Life as an Assassin may still be unfamiliar, but do not be anxious. You can learn the skills you need one step at a time from the nearby masters.
May your devotion to Shilen make you silent, unseen and deadly to our foes. Congratulations once again!
Our guild has prepared this small gift to assist you in your journey. Take this to the Grand Master, Grand Magister, Master Trainer or High Priest who permits transfers in any major town and you will be able to exchange it for a usable Shadow Weapon.
